review: Love the interface, works well!  5 stars if there were more prime movies, either I am unsure where to look for them or they are not listed.  I do recommend this!
author: Kerry Wald

review: It was better than expected. I received it about two weeks early. The interface is better than the Roku and any other blu ray player that I use to stream. It is also very efficient and hidden away. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for their first or another streaming device.
author: Frank Pressel

review: The Fire stick meet my expectations. The setup was very easy. I've been using it without any issues.  I will be buying another one.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's not bad.  I didn't notice that it needs to be plugged in and since it does it could use a longer cord. I bought two and I had to set up the WiFi twice for both. You would think that a new product would show up up-to-date. The apps are great.  I would love a keyboard for it but so far the phone app works great.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Setup was a little convoluted with the update installing right away and having to put in my wifi password twice.The interface makes looking for new shows a bit odd. Wish it would show more show thumbnails 8 the screen.Also SD versions of tv and movies are hidden back behind the "more ways to watch" button which took me forever to find.
author: Karl Carpenter

review: Great deal especially if you're a prime member. Very convenient and easy to use.
author: Vadim Minosyan

review: Great cost/entertainment ratio.  Plug and play and keeps the family occupied.
author: G. Sherman

review: There are a lot of reviews comparing this stick to others -- this isn't one of them. Forgetting competing products for a bit (I own both  Chromecast and Roku), I couldn't be happier with this streaming device. It's very easy to install, has great WiFi connectivity, and very fast operation with the included remote. If you watch Prime videos, NetFlix and Hulu, this device is a no-brainer - it's the price/performance winner.
author: Jim Logan

review: Excellent device and I love how fast it is.
author: manuel
